name: STOMP (Westonini)
description:
Solo project entry and winner for the VGDA Spring 2020 Game Jam, made within 24 hours!

Plot:
Somewhere in some town lives a crazed villain who enjoys creating inventions that only cause pain and suffering for others. You are that villain. Your most recent invention, the GrowBigInator, appears to be a BIG success. Equipped with your homemade LaserGlasses3000, you decide to test out the destructive power of your new humongous body.

Instructions:

- Your goal is to cause as much destruction as possible
- Continuously jump (spacebar) on houses to destroy them
- Use your laser eyes (hold left click) to burn everything to a crisp. Keep in mind that it cannot be held endlessly.
- Cause as much destruction as you can within the time limit.
